member.name: T:BLE_UUID_Generator.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:BLE_UUID_Generator.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:BLE_UUID_Generator.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:BLE_UUID_Generator.Form1.GenerateGUIDCheckNotReserved
member.summary: Generates a GUID using Microsoft API which does not clash with BT SIG reserved UUIDs
member.returns: GUID string with dashes in upper case

member.name: M:BLE_UUID_Generator.Form1.IsUUID_BTSIG_Reserved(System.String)
member.summary: Checks UUID string to see if it is a BT SIG reserved type
member.param: UUID as a string, either with dashes or without

member.name: M:BLE_UUID_Generator.Form1.SplitReverseGUID(System.String)
member.summary: Takes a GUID in format 03B80E5A-EDE8-4B33-A751-6CE34EC4C700 and produces little endian hex formatted comma separated list with containing brackets
member.param: Guid in string format, can include dashes
member.returns: Little endian hex format comma separated list with containing brackets
